accountId.title: Account ID
accountId.description: ID of the account this transaction belongs to

date.title: Date
date.description: Date of the transaction in YYYY-MM-DD format

authorizedAt.title: Authorized At
authorizedAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was authorized, if available (UTC).

postedAt.title: Posted At
postedAt.description: Timestamp when the transaction was posted/cleared, if available (UTC).

currency.title: Currency
currency.description: ISO 4217 currency code for the transaction.

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: Transaction amount in integer minor units. Can be positive or negative.

aggregationServiceId.title: Aggregation Service ID
aggregationServiceId.description: Identifier for this transaction in a financial data aggregation service.

transactionState.title: Transaction State
transactionState.description: The current state of the transaction.
